dct_title_s: A new & accurate map of Persia : with the adjacent countries. Drawn from the most approved modern maps &c. The whole being regulated by astronl. observations
dct_description_sm: Map of Persia with relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: London. Plate 39 from: A complete atlas, or, Distinct view of the known world / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... [et al.], 1752.
dct_publisher_sm: [London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... [et al.], 1752]
